alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin; Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops; Lower Yampa River Basin; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 05 at 11:02AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...HEAVY SNOW BAND... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1102 AM MST, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from 7 miles north of Craig to 10 miles southeast of Rangely and moving northeast at 30 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Craig, Lay and Juniper Springs. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 40 in Colorado between mile markers 64 and 93. Colorado 13 between mile markers 80 and 105. Colorado 64 between mile markers 40 and 58. Colorado 139 between mile markers 60 and 63. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
